fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - And this is crazy: If you are lynched within the first three days you instantly win and may reroll all the roles as many of your voters as you wish, they must become a role of the same category.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- But here's my number: Reveal your role to a player at night. Then kill them. Hopefully they don't have powerful defense. 1 use per night.
- So call me maybe: Randomly roll a town role yourself, you may pick the category if you so wish. Copy an ability from that role. 3 uses, may be used at any time.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all those who would oppose you
